text: Carolyn Moxley Rouse (born c. 1965) is an American anthropologist, professor and filmmaker. She is Professor and Chair of the Department of Anthropology at Princeton University. In her junior year, she studied abroad in Kenya in a program focused on wildlife biology. She is a master's in visual anthropology and a Ph.D. in anthropology from the University of Southern California. title: Carolyn Rouse
